meaningMnemonic: Everything on a <kanji>location</kanji>'s <kanji>surface</kanji> is really just a part of the <vocabulary>scene</vocabulary> before you. This is the kind of scene that would be set in a novel. It's the <vocabulary>setting</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading is a combination of kun'yomi and on'yomi readings. That being said, both readings for both kanji are the readings you learned already, so you should be able to read this.
